system.description:
You slice into a target’s communicator (I-II), holograph (I-II), or primitive computer, creating a disadvantage by interfering with a critical system—such as distorting their vision feed, disrupting their armor controls, or triggering a distracting alert. This requires you to use an ordinary or advanced computer.

When you perform the Interact with Technology action with those conditions, you can alternatively select the following stunts:

  • Incoming Call: Your target becomes @UUID[Compendium.coriolis-modern-combat.items.Item.oj8DBDbF82W0095D]{Distracted} until the end of their next turn.
  • Popups: Your target becomes @UUID[Compendium.coriolis-modern-combat.items.Item.IiJp0aqnZZ3ezeq6]{Confused} until the end of their next turn.
  • Riot: Your target becomes @UUID[Compendium.coriolis-modern-combat.items.Item.iR0XsAz6ptPvbGNU]{Dazed} until the end of their next turn.
